resources.string:
This app can enable/disable HDMI support in Irbis ROM.
This is not the HDMI switch on/off like the switch in system settings.
If you switch HDMI to disable in this app then your device is not support HDMI.

Disable HDMI support in this ROM slightly but still raises the system performance, it is recommended when you don't use HDMI all the time.

CPU and GPU Boost options switch your CPU/GPU to maximum performance.
To apply changes device must be rebooted. Reboot now ?
Error while downloading required file(s). Make sure you have stable internet connection and restart appliction ! May be a temporary problem with the download server, try again in 10 minutes.
Internet connection is required to download HDMI libraries (~80KB)! Enable internet connection and restart app.

Irbis HDMI Switcher is now Irbis Tweaks !

 New features:
CPU Boost - Boost to 1.2 GHz
GPU Boost - GPU max performance
Previous application shutdown was unexpected.\nDo you want to send error report?
